verses.verse: כַּשֶּׁ֤לֶג ׀ <S%H7950><s%> As snow בַּקַּ֗יִץ <S%H7019><s%> in summer וְכַמָּטָ֥ר <S%H4306><s%> and as rain בַּקָּצִ֑יר <S%H7105><s%> in harvest כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> So לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not נָאוֶ֖ה <S%H5000><s%> is not seemly לִכְסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> for a fool כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> so honour

כַּצִּפּ֣וֹר <S%H6833><s%> As the bird לָ֭נוּד <S%H5110><s%> by wandering כַּדְּר֣וֹר <S%H1866><s%> as the swallow לָע֑וּף <S%H5774><s%> by flying כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So קִֽלְלַ֥ת <S%H7045><s%> so the curse חִ֝נָּ֗ם <S%H2600><s%> causeless [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) תָבֹֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall not come

שׁ֣וֹט <S%H7752><s%> A whip לַ֭סּוּס <S%H5483><s%> for the horse מֶ֣תֶג <S%H4964><s%> a bridle לַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> for the ass וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט <S%H7626><s%> and a rod לְגֵ֣ו <S%H1460><s%> back כְּסִילִֽים׃ <S%H3684><s%> for the fool's

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> Answer כְּ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> not a fool כְּאִוַּלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H200><s%> according to his folly פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תִּשְׁוֶה־ <S%H7737><s%> lest thou also be like לּ֥וֹ גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

עֲנֵ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> Answer כְ֭סִיל <S%H3684><s%> a fool כְּאִוַּלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H200><s%> according to his folly פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> lest he be wise בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> in his own conceit

מְקַצֶּ֣ה <S%H7096><s%> cutteth off רַ֭גְלַיִם <S%H7272><s%> the feet חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> damage שֹׁתֶ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> [and] drinketh שֹׁלֵ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> He that sendeth דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> a message בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand כְּסִֽיל׃ <S%H3684><s%> of a fool

דַּלְי֣וּ <S%H1809><s%> are not equal שֹׁ֭קַיִם <S%H7785><s%> The legs מִפִּסֵּ֑חַ <S%H6455><s%> of the lame וּ֝מָשָׁ֗ל <S%H4912><s%> so [is] a parable בְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> in the mouth כְסִילִֽים׃ <S%H3684><s%> of fools

כִּצְר֣וֹר <S%H6887><s%> binds אֶ֭בֶן <S%H68><s%> a stone בְּמַרְגֵּמָ֑ה <S%H4773><s%> in a sling כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> So נוֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> so [is] he that giveth לִכְסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> to a fool כָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> honour

ח֭וֹחַ <S%H2336><s%> [As] a thorn עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> goeth up בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand שִׁכּ֑וֹר <S%H7910><s%> of a drunkard וּ֝מָשָׁ֗ל <S%H4912><s%> so [is] a parable בְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> in the mouth כְסִילִֽים׃ <S%H3684><s%> of fools

רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> The great מְחֽוֹלֵֽל־ <S%H2342><s%> [God] that formed כֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone וְשֹׂכֵ֥ר <S%H7936><s%> all [things] both rewardeth כְּ֝סִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> the fool וְשֹׂכֵ֥ר <S%H7936><s%> and rewardeth עֹבְרִֽים׃ <S%H5674><s%> transgressors

כְּ֭כֶלֶב <S%H3611><s%> As a dog שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> returneth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto קֵא֑וֹ <S%H6892><s%> to his vomit כְּ֝סִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> [so] a fool שׁוֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8138><s%> returneth בְאִוַּלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H200><s%> to his folly

רָאִ֗יתָ <S%H7200><s%> Seest אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thou a man חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> wise בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> affliction תִּקְוָ֖ה <S%H8615><s%> hope לִכְסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> of a fool מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> [man] saith עָ֭צֵל <S%H6102><s%> The slothful שַׁ֣חַל <S%H7826><s%> [There is] a lion בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way אֲ֝רִ֗י <S%H738><s%> a lion בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> is in הָרְחֹבֽוֹת׃ <S%H7339><s%> [is] in the streets

הַ֭דֶּלֶת <S%H1817><s%> [As] the door תִּסּ֣וֹב <S%H5437><s%> turneth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צִירָ֑הּ <S%H6735><s%> upon his hinges וְ֝עָצֵ֗ל <S%H6102><s%> so [doth] the slothful עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִטָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4296><s%> upon his bed

טָ֘מַ֤ן <S%H2934><s%> hideth עָצֵ֣ל <S%H6102><s%> The slothful יָ֭דוֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בַּצַּלָּ֑חַת <S%H6747><s%> in [his] bosom נִ֝לְאָ֗ה <S%H3811><s%> it grieveth לַֽהֲשִׁיבָ֥הּ <S%H7725><s%> him to bring it again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פִּֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> to his mouth

חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> [is] wiser עָצֵ֣ל <S%H6102><s%> The sluggard בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> in his own conceit מִ֝שִּׁבְעָ֗ה <S%H7651><s%> than seven men מְשִׁ֣יבֵי <S%H7725><s%> that can render טָֽעַם׃ <S%H2940><s%> a reason

מַחֲזִ֥יק <S%H2388><s%> [belonging] not to him [is like] one that taketh בְּאָזְנֵי־ <S%H241><s%> by the ears כָ֑לֶב <S%H3611><s%> a dog עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> He that passeth by מִ֝תְעַבֵּ֗ר <S%H5674><s%> [and] meddleth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with רִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> with strife לֹּֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not לֽוֹ׃
כְּֽ֭מִתְלַהְלֵהַּ <S%H3856><s%> As a mad הַיֹּרֶ֥ה <S%H3384><s%> [man] who casteth זִקִּ֗ים <S%H2131><s%> firebrands חִצִּ֥ים <S%H2671><s%> arrows וָמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> and death

כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> So אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> So [is] the man רִמָּ֣ה <S%H7411><s%> [that] deceiveth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour וְ֝אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and saith הֲ‍ֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מְשַׂחֵ֥ק <S%H7832><s%> Am not I in sport אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

בְּאֶ֣פֶס <S%H657><s%> Where no עֵ֭צִים <S%H6086><s%> wood תִּכְבֶּה־ <S%H3518><s%> goeth out אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> is [there] the fire וּבְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there נִ֝רְגָּ֗ן <S%H5372><s%> so where [there is] no talebearer יִשְׁתֹּ֥ק <S%H8367><s%> ceaseth מָדֽוֹן׃ <S%H4066><s%> the strife

פֶּחָ֣ם <S%H6352><s%> [As] coals לְ֭גֶחָלִים <S%H1513><s%> [are] to burning coals וְעֵצִ֣ים <S%H6086><s%> and wood לְאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> to fire וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) לְחַרְחַר־ <S%H2787><s%> to kindle רִֽיב׃ <S%H7379><s%> strife פ

דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> The words נִ֭רְגָּן <S%H5372><s%> of a talebearer כְּמִֽתְלַהֲמִ֑ים <S%H3859><s%> [are] as wounds וְ֝הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> and they go down חַדְרֵי־ <S%H2315><s%> into the innermost parts בָֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> of the belly

כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver סִ֭יגִים <S%H5509><s%> dross מְצֻפֶּ֣ה <S%H6823><s%> covered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חָ֑רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> [are like] a potsherd שְׂפָתַ֖יִם <S%H8193><s%> lips דֹּלְקִ֣ים <S%H1814><s%> Burning וְלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> and a wicked

[בִּשְׂפָתֹו כ] (בִּ֭שְׂפָתָיו <S%H8193><s%> band ק) יִנָּכֵ֣ר <S%H5234><s%> dissembleth שׂוֹנֵ֑א <S%H8130><s%> He that hateth וּ֝בְקִרְבּ֗וֹ <S%H7130><s%> within יָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> and layeth up מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> deceit

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יְחַנֵּ֣ן <S%H2603><s%> fair ק֭וֹלוֹ <S%H6963><s%> When he speaketh אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּֽאֲמֶן־ <S%H539><s%> believe בּ֑וֹ כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7651><s%> him not for [there are] seven תּוֹעֵב֣וֹת <S%H8441><s%> abominations בְּלִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart

תִּכַּסֶּ֣ה <S%H3680><s%> is covered שִׂ֭נְאָה <S%H8135><s%> [Whose] hatred בְּמַשָּׁא֑וֹן <S%H4860><s%> by deceit תִּגָּלֶ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> shall be shewed רָעָת֣וֹ <S%H7451><s%> his wickedness בְקָהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> before the [whole] congregation

כֹּֽרֶה־ <S%H3738><s%> Whoso diggeth שַּׁ֭חַת <S%H7845><s%> a pit בָּ֣הּ יִפֹּ֑ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְגֹ֥לֵ֥ל <S%H1556><s%> therein and he that rolleth אֶ֝בֶן <S%H68><s%> a stone אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> about תָּשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> it will return

לְֽשׁוֹן־ <S%H3956><s%> tongue שֶׁ֭קֶר <S%H8267><s%> A lying יִשְׂנָ֣א <S%H8130><s%> hateth דַכָּ֑יו <S%H1790><s%> [those that are] afflicted וּפֶ֥ה <S%H6310><s%> mouth חָ֝לָ֗ק <S%H2509><s%> by it and a flattering יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> worketh מִדְחֶֽה׃ <S%H4072><s%> ruin
